name: H&HIS
description: H&HIS is the start-up Media & Headhunting agency in Viet Nam founded in April 2021. We want to build a professional and creative work environment for young people. We provide the best solutions to all our clients.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Headline: #H&HIS #InternationalStrategy
ShortDescription: H&HIS is the start-up Media & Headhunting agency in Viet Nam founded in April 2021.
enhanced_description: H&HIS is a start-up Media & Headhunting agency based in Viet Nam, founded in April 2021. As a staffing services provider and HR consulting provider, H&HIS aims to deliver professional and creative solutions to its clients with the core objective of boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity.
key_use_cases: Talent acquisition and placement through headhunting services
Enhancing hiring process efficiency and outcomes
